name: Hillside
description:
Hillside is a towerdefence game project ive started to create in early 2020

goal of this project is to create one of the best towerdefence game out there.

this is a small level ive made to show the current system. now the reason for it beeing just one level, is because ive stil not nailed the difficulty, also i wanted to get the core system to work as great as it can get, before building up on it.

ive gone ahead and converted it into webGL, and because of it this means that some functions wont work as intendet. its build to work as a PC-Standalone version."not Web-GL". so please take this into a count.

the game is currently not supported by anyone, nor fundet. its just me, and a lot of time and efford. and i love it.

so please leave me a comment on what you think, whats good, whats not, whats missing, etc. i love to get more oppinions on this.

and thanks for checking it out
